Headline: #51 51st Temporary Westbound Reroute near 51st/Sacramento.
ShortDescription: Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, California, 47th, Kedzie, due to a street blockage near 51st/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, California, 47th, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 51st, due to a street blockage near 51st/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Clinton
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clinton due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clinton due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
